short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pop confetti when you complete JIRA tickets!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Celebrate all your wins. Pop confetti in response to any web event. Starting with the completion of JIRA tickets!

Works with any JIRA URL with the following structure:
https://<subdomain>.atlassian.net/jira/software/projects/<jira-project-code>/boards/1?selectedIssue=<jira-project-code>-<jira-ticket-number>

Please send requests for new events to support+chrome@sidr.io.
